name: Ng-Markdown
body:
# Ng-Markdown *** ## Parameters
Name Type Description Defaults to
sanitized boolean Sanitize the Markdown output. true
prefix string How the elements of the markdown should be prefixed. wmd-
postfix (required when more than 1 MarkDown on the page) string How the elements of the markdown should be postfixed. ""
preConversion expression Called with the Markdown source as given to the converter's makeHtml object, should return the actual to-be-converted source. Fine to chain. null
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
